column5: The C.O.'s were set up inside the main entrance at BPS with a booth promoting their Cookbook, every one who bought one was entered into a draw for something, I have the original Edition put out for their Centennial in 1992, great way to help support their organization plus you get a very nice Cookbook. Great X-mas, Birthday present. Richard
Sounds like a good deal all around, Richard. Glad you and your family had a good time there in spite of the long drive.
where do the proceeds go  to buy gas for their trucks?  LOL
I was talking to one of the young C.O's & he was saying it goes towards programs towards kids, but I'm not sure what, Richard
that would be a good thing for them to use the money on
Aleast they would be able to get around to get the bad guys.
This is one thing I found & I bet the kids would have a lot of fun Richard  http://www.ocoa.ca/M...9-05Horwood.htm
